main event: A witness observed a bright round object hovering or moving slowly in the night sky over Aiken, South Carolina on November 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as being several times larger than a star and gave off a steady white light., The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 seconds before the object went out of sight., A second witness reported a disc-shaped object hovering above Highway Route #1 in the vicinity of Couchton, SC with similar characteristics., A total of 3-4 minutes of observation by another witness was noted before the object accelerated and disappeared silently., The Air Force requested additional information from local authorities to further investigate the sighting.
witness description: Civilians, including a commercial airline pilot, reported the sightings.
